issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently timezone information is not being processed by DruidSerde (contrary to other SerDes).
fields.summary: Infer timezone information correctly in DruidSerde

comments.body:
[~ashutoshc], could you review? This fixes an issue with usage of timezone information in DruidSerDe. As the SerDe is being initialized differently than other SerDes, time zone information was not being transferred to column types. This issue is only present in Hive3, since it has to do with new 'timestamp with local time zone' type.

Cc [~nishantbangarwa]
